overview:
“David Thompson brings over 20 years of strategic marketing experience, with the last 14 years focused on businesses operating at the convergence of wireless, software and security. He is responsible for developing and implementing all marketing initiatives. Prior to ClairMail, David was vice president of marketing with PacketHop, a developer of mobile mesh networking software. Previously, David held positions of vice president of marketing and vice president, carriers and business development at Good Technology.

David also served as vice president of marketing with iPass, Inc. and was vice president of marketing, sales and operations at Corsair Communications. David holds a bachelor’s degree in economics from Harvard University.” (Source: ClairMail)
